programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S2
programme.desc: This returning series brings imagination, design and creativity to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and anunlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two will compete against each other in ambitious brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S2

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics USA S6
programme.desc: The hit music game show is back! Just like in the original version, one contestant must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2
programme.desc: Each episode of this cooking competition begins at the scene of the crime -- a kitchen that was just used to make an amazing, mouthwatering dessert that has since disappeared. To take the $100,000 prize, the competing dessert makers will need to prove they have the technical know-how, imagination and problem-solving skills needed to decode and re-create incredible desserts and cakes from across the world.

programme.title: The Wonders Of The World That I Can't See
programme.desc: Blind comedian Chris McCausland travels the globe to explore some of the world's most iconic landmarks in a new and unique way that discovers things the ordinary traveller might miss.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: JoJo and GranGran: Sr3
programme.desc: The award-winning animated series celebrates the special relationship between an inquisitive girl and her vibrant grandmother. programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: A meteorite has landed in Ollipolis! The gang sets off into the forest to find it and uncovers a space crystal. Meanwhile, Poly-GON's spaceship needs a new energy source - fast! programme.desc: Rozz travels to Germany to meet Danelle Tan, the first Singaporean female footballer in a European league. Find out Danelle's journey with Borussia Dortmund, her sacrifices, and her dream of going pro.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: In this second part special, Munah Bagharib and Steven Chia seek novel solutions to counter the rat problem. From alcohol-based traps to rat contraceptives, how can we win the battle against rats?

programme.desc: Zara gets Adina to throw her an extravagant birthday party. Rosnani tries to persuade Zaryf to move back. Louis tracks down Celia's alleged rapist while Jessica plans to match-make Ah Yoke with Dr Shen.

programme.title: 木木奇幻之旅
programme.desc: 木妈表示木木考试及格就买模型给他。木木走捷径，许愿到一个「没有金钱，只能以物易物」的世界，用家里的物品来换取他要的东西。木木一开始如鱼得水，但随着时间过去，「物物交换」制度的问题逐渐浮现。 Yoko帮助木木，两人成为了好友。最后，木木按照博士的指示，带着Yoko穿越「通道」回到现实世界，Yoko从此成为木木的旅伴….

programme.title: 变形联盟

programme.title: 变形联盟

programme.title: 星期二特写 ：店屋话今昔
programme.desc: 拥有92年历史的兴化餐馆历经老店拆迁后，毅然在新址重起炉灶，坚守着古早味道。店屋不仅承载着第三代人何金生的童年记忆，也成为老顾客的情感纽带。华美精致的贝当路店屋吸引退休律师卢朝运到此安家，儿子卢方伟则将其改造为共享居住空间。店屋爱好者谢敏盈因机缘巧合，在新加坡中药公会的店屋楼下开设餐馆，为老建筑保留了历史韵味。.

programme.title: 骊歌行
programme.desc: 与此同时，盛楚慕已先行一步到达奉天观，被苏天师纠缠着下棋。盛楚慕故意泄露自己拥有《玲珑棋谱》，勾起苏天师兴趣，与他定下赌约。历经一番对战，苏天师终赢得棋局，获得棋谱。 皇后等人顺利到达奉天观，傅柔偶然帮助寺内大师袁道长解决了道袍变色的问题，对方送她丹药以表感谢。.

programme.title: 骊歌行
programme.desc: 曹元气愤喝酒，不慎跌下山丘。盛楚慕如约把下半本《玲珑棋谱》交给苏天师。陆琪不等受伤的曹元，先行出发护送皇后等人启程回长安。皇后邀傅柔同乘马车，因差点将傅柔赐给梁王而愧疚的皇后赐给傅柔免罪手帕。而此时早有埋伏的洪义德大举攻击车队，陆琪与士兵拼死抵抗，梁王、太上皇及皇后、傅柔乘马车逃出。千钧一发之际，盛楚慕前来救援，与陆琪齐心退敌。梁王一行慌不择路，竟逃入了大苍山的绝地迷道。.

programme.title: 好睡好起
programme.desc: 《好睡好起》，颠覆大家对睡眠世界的想像，全城启动Sleeping Mode！家家有本难「睡」的经，「数绵羊」有科学根据？ 「睡眠债」怎样还？走进睡眠实验室，嘉宾「瞓身」参与，一觉醒来，有何惊人发现？人人会睡，但未必个个睡得好，想睡得好，要从睡前做起。从今天开始，大家《好睡好起》！.

programme.title: 小岛国 大发现2
programme.desc: 学驾驶私人飞机已成为本地人的嗜好之一，但要考获私人飞行执照需具备哪些条件？你是否见过“信箱质检员“？他们的工作职责究竟是什么？另外，跟随主持人揭秘亚洲最大游轮的幕后运作。迎接5千名乘客的大游轮需要储藏多少粮食？游轮的大型洗衣房是如何操作？看节目长知识！.
